user_instruction: 'Please craft a response to Mark'"'"'s email (mark@baxterassociates.com) with some guidance on the procedural matter. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Assistance Needed: Materials for Responding to Mark @ Baxter & Associates

Hi [Colleague/Assistant Name],

Could you please pull together the following items so Jane can draft a reply to Mark (mark@baxterassociates.com) about the procedural matter?

1. The original email chain from Mark (check Gmail – look for messages received this week with subject line containing “procedural guidance”).
2. Any relevant notes, checklists, or precedent documents in Notion that relate to the procedural steps we followed in the Smithson litigation (or any similar matter you find in the “Litigation Playbooks > Procedural Motions” section).
3. A brief summary of key deadlines or filing requirements that surfaced in our past work, if they’re captured in the calendar or Notion timeline.

If you could send or share links to these resources by the end of the afternoon, that would be terrific. Let me know if anything is missing or unclear.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]

final_output:
